taskDefinition.name: Active Directory User Remove Groups
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Finds a user in active directory by Distinguished Name, Full Name, Email Address, or User Logon and remove that user as a member from one or more groups.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Search By
parameter.tooltip: Choose which attribute of the user to search by

parameter.label: Search Value
parameter.tooltip: The value of the Distinguished Name, Full Name, User Logon, or Email Address that will be used to search for the desired user.

parameter.label: Groups
parameter.tooltip: The common name(s) of the group(s) to remove. More than one group can be specified by separating each group with a comma.
